text: sachche eemaanadaar to bas vahee log hain ki jab (unake saamane) khuda ka zikr kiya jaata hai to unake dil hil jaate hain aur jab unake saamane usakee aayaten padhee jaatee hain to unake eemaan ko aur bhee jyaada kar detee hain aur vah log bas apane paravaradigaar hee par bharosa rakhate hain
